title: 1930's HEART OF HANCOCK PARK LOVELY ART DECO 1BD/1BA UNIT, SYCAMORE AV
posting_body: ['There’s something about Sycamore Ave.', 'Perhaps it’s the regal, indigenous sycamore trees lining the street…Or the proximity to Los Angeles’ best cultural, dining, and shopping experiences…Or the convenience of being in the center of a bustling, bright city yet within the walls of your own personal sanctuary.', 'Yes, it is all these things and more.', 'Angelenos know Sycamore Ave.', 'Here is your chance to know it too.', 'Available October 1, 2022, this spacious, light-filled 1 BR, 1 BA lower unit offers 1800 square feet of 1930s Art Deco restored glory including hardwood floors, coved ceilings, antique chandeliers and wall sconces, arched doorways, built-in bookcases, a large bay window balcony, and period hardware throughout.', 'The deco tiled kitchen with restored vintage stove opens to a separate dining room with glass hutches and French windows – the perfect setting for inspirational morning coffee or an intimate dinner party.', 'Walk the charming hallway to a spacious bedroom filled with light and possibility…and a large walk-in closet.', 'Or spend an extra stolen moment in the aquamarine and black Art Deco tiled bathroom, soaking in the tub or splashing in the separate shower.', 'Ready to step outside your new haven, refreshed and ready for adventure?', 'This pedestrian-friendly neighborhood offers boundless possibilities including Republique, La Brea Bakery, Sycamore Kitchen, the Sunday Farmer’s Market and The Grove.', 'Time and your pocketbook are the only limitations.', 'Short on cash?', 'The building’s rooftop deck provides sunset and city views free of charge.', 'For a video tour of a similar unit within the same building, please visit <URL> under “Available Apartments: 400 N Sycamore”.', 'Please note: the video is of Unit 5, which is upper and not currently available, but it has many similar features to Unit 4, which is lower and the one that is available on October 1.', 'Washer/Dryer', 'Optional Parking', 'Pets Welcome', 'Unfurnished', 'Available October 1, 2022']
